name: FN FAL extended magazine
description: An extended 30-round steel box magazine for the FN FAL rifle.

name: FN FAL magazine
description: A military issue 20-round steel box magazine for the FN FAL rifle.

name: FN FAL makeshift magazine
description: An improvised 5-round straight single-stack box magazine consisting of little more than a bent sheet of steel held together by duct tape and hope, for use with FN FAL rifle.

name: H&K G3 drum magazine
description: A 50-round drum magazine for the H&K G3 rifle.

name: H&K G3 magazine
description: A lightweight aluminum box magazine for the H&K G3 rifle.

name: H&K G3 makeshift magazine
description: An improvised 5-round straight single-stack box magazine consisting of little more than a bent sheet of steel held together by duct tape and hope, for use with G3 rifle.

name: M14 magazine
description: A military issue 20-round steel box magazine compatible with M14 pattern rifles.

name: M14 compact magazine
description: A compact aftermarket 5-round steel box magazine compatible with M14 pattern rifles.  Although it has a low capacity it is easy to store and quick to reload.

name: M14 makeshift magazine
description: An improvised 5-round straight single-stack box magazine consisting of little more than a bent sheet of steel held together by duct tape and hope, for use with M14 rifle.

name: FN SCAR-H drum magazine
description: A 50-round drum magazine for the FN SCAR-H rifle.

name: FN SCAR-H 30-round magazine
description: A 30-round steel box magazine for the FN SCAR-H rifle.  This one actually seems to be a modified FN FAL magazine.

name: FN SCAR-H magazine
description: A military issue 20-round steel box magazine for the FN SCAR-H rifle.

name: FN SCAR-H makeshift magazine
description: An improvised 5-round straight single-stack box magazine consisting of little more than a bent sheet of steel held together by duct tape and hope, for use with FN SCAR-H rifle.

name: HK417 magazine
description: A 20 round double stack box magazine for the HK417 rifle.

name: HK417 compact magazine
description: A 10 round double stack box magazine for the HK417 rifle.

name: HK417 makeshift magazine
description: An improvised 5-round straight single-stack box magazine consisting of little more than a bent sheet of steel held together by duct tape and hope, for use with HK417 rifle.

name: AR-10 magazine
description: A 20 round double stack box magazine for the AR-10 rifle.

name: AR-10 makeshift magazine
description: An improvised 5-round straight single-stack box magazine consisting of little more than a bent sheet of steel held together by duct tape and hope, for use with AR-10 rifle.
